Section.name: About AMET
Section.description:
Academy of Maritime Education and Training (AMET), established in 1993, is a maritime educational academy situated in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. It is a technology-oriented institute for higher education, which was regarded as a University under section 3 of the University Grants Commission Act, 1956. This institute offers UG, PG, Ph.D., and various other courses in streams of engineering, and maritime education and training.
4.1 How to Apply?

AMET University Eligibility Criteria

The following table gives details about the courses being conducted at the AMET Chennai:
Eligibility: Master’s degree in relevant subject with min. 55% marks, entrance exam merit rank, and personal interviews Duration: 2 to 5 years
Click AMET Chennai Courses and Fees
The Academy has courses right from undergraduate in B.E., B.Sc., BBA to postgraduate in M.E., M.B.A., and M.Sc. Postgraduate students also have Ph.D. options to continue education into Research and Development in Naval Science.
How to Apply?
Check here AMET Chennai Admission
AMET placement department co-ordinates with companies for on-campus interviews. The top recruiting companies are Maersk, Shell, Selandia, Fleet, DHL, Transworld, Beta, and HCL. For Marine Engineering, placements begin in the 1st year itself. The bulk recruiter from this college is Maersk Line. Listed below are the placement details of the college is given below:

AMET University offers scholarship programs for deserving students. Given below are the seven categories in which scholarships are provided:
Read more: AMET Chennai Scholarship
The following facilities are being provided for the students during their tenure with the college:
Library: This college has well equipped open accessed Central Library consisting of more than 900 books, periodicals, dissertations, back volumes, projects and e-journal facilities, etc.
Sports and Games: There are indoor and outdoor sports facilities available for the students inside the campus, which include volleyball court, basketball court, gymnasium, kabaddi court, indoor game hall, and swimming pool.
Health facility: Full-time medical facility is available within the campus. A doctor and a nurse are also available in the campus for any medical emergency.
Click AMET Chennai Hostel
AMET University faculty under the leadership of Chancellor Dr. J.Ramachandran. This college has 190+ faculty members who hold or are pursuing their Ph.D. degree in their respective fields of expertise and has worked in their field for a long time. Faculty members have done 20 consultancy projects, 39 sponsored research projects, and 2 IPR in the academic year 2018-2019.

faqs.question: What are the eligibility criteria to pursue a diploma in Marine engineering?
faqs.answer: Ans.The eligibility criteria to pursue a Diploma course in Marine Engineering from AMET is 10+2 with at least 50% marks from a recognized board.

faqs.question: What is the total fee amount for 4 years in Marine Engineering at AMET University?
faqs.answer: Ans.Total fees for the four-year course are around Rs.5 Lakhs, for Marine Engineering at AMET University.

faqs.question: Is AMET University a good choice for pursuing B.Sc Nautical Science. How are its placements assistance for students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, AMET is good for B.Sc. Nautical Science. The college is dedicated to maritime education and training.

faqs.question: How many seats are available for B. Sc Nautical Science at AMET University. Also is the selection process tough?
faqs.answer: Ans.The total seats are 250 for B.Sc. Nautical Science at AMET University.
